# ciphers

Code implementation of common encryption algorithms

## vigenere.py

A polyalphabetic substitution cipher

`Usage: vigenere.py [-e filename|plaintext] [-d filename|ciphertext] secret`

```
$ python vigenere.py -e "the quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog" qwertyuiop
JDIKJSCKYIRNSNGRZWLIZQQGXBNWJTHPXYXRFINNJZSX
$ python vigenere.py -d JDIKJSCKYIRNSNGRZWLIZQQGXBNWJTHPXYXRFINNJZSX qwertyuiop
THETQUICKTBROWNTFOXTJUMPEDTOVERTTHETLAZYTDOG

$ python vigenere.py -e vigenere.py secret > ciphertext
$ python vigenere.py -d ciphertext secret

````
